trans-unit.source: References <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> objects stored at a different location when using XMLDSIG or XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Faz referência a objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> armazenados em um local diferente ao usar a criptografia XMLDSIG ou XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod> class represents the `<RetrievalMethod>` element for both XML encryption and XML digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod> classe representa o `<RetrievalMethod>` elemento para assinaturas digitais XML e de criptografia de XML.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod> class to reference the same <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> information in multiple XMLDSIG signatures or encrypted XML documents, especially when the referenced information is large.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod> classe façam referência à mesma <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> documentos de informações em várias assinaturas XMLDSIG ou XML criptografado, especialmente quando as informações de referência são grandes.

trans-unit.source: For example, a `<RetrievalMethod>` subelement can be used to reference a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data> object that contains an X.509v3 certificate chain, which validates the signing key.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um `<RetrievalMethod>` subelemento pode ser usado como referência um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data> objeto que contém uma cadeia de certificados x. 509v3 que valida a chave de assinatura.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<RetrievalMethod>` element, see Section 4.4.3 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `<RetrievalMethod>` elemento, consulte a seção 4.4.3 da especificação XMLDSIG, que está disponível na World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, ou consulte a especificação de criptografia de XML, que está disponível a partir do W3C em www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" />.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the information to be referenced by the new instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" />.
trans-unit.target: O URI (identificador de recurso uniforme) das informações a serem referenciadas pela nova instância do <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> class with the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) pointing to the referenced <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> com o URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) especificado apontando para o objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> de referência.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the information to be referenced by the new instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" />.
trans-unit.target: O URI (identificador de recurso uniforme) das informações a serem referenciadas pela nova instância do <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> class with the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) pointing to the referenced <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> object and the URI that describes the type of data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> com o URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) especificado apontando para o objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> referenciado e o URI que descreve o tipo de dados a serem recuperados.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a representação XML do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" />.

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A representação XML do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object returned by this method is suitable for use as a subelement of an XMLDSIG or XML encryption `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> objeto retornado por esse método é adequado para uso como um subelemento de uma criptografia XMLDSIG ou XML `<KeyInfo>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The XML element that specifies the state of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O elemento XML que especifica o estado do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" />.

trans-unit.source: Parses the input <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object and configures the internal state of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> object to match.
trans-unit.target: Analisa o objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> de entrada e configura o estado interno do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> a corresponder.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used to process a `<RetrievalMethod>` subelement of a `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é normalmente usado para processar uma `<RetrievalMethod>` subelemento de um `<KeyInfo>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the type of data to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) que descreve o tipo de dados a serem recuperados.

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the type of data to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Um URI Uniform Resource Identifier () que descreve o tipo de dados a serem recuperados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" />.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de recursos uniforme (URI) da <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> objeto.
